SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am24.model.deck

Class ResourceDeck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am24.model.deck.ResourceDeck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Deck
public class ResourceDeck extends Object implements Deck
The ResourceDeck class represents a deck of resource cards. It implements the Deck interface and provides methods to load, shuffle, and draw cards from the deck.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ResourceDeck()
    Constructs a new ResourceDeck and loads the cards into the deck.

  • Method Details

    • loadCards

      public void loadCards()
      Loads the resource cards into the deck from a JSON file. This method initializes the deck with resource cards by reading from the specified JSON file.
      Specified by:
      loadCards in interface Deck

    • shuffle

      public void shuffle()
      Shuffles the deck to randomize the order of the cards.
      Specified by:
      shuffle in interface Deck

    • drawCard

      public ResourceCard drawCard() throws EmptyDeckException
      Draws a card from the deck. This method removes the top card from the deck and returns it.
      Specified by:
      drawCard in interface Deck
      Returns:
      the drawn ResourceCard
      Throws:
      EmptyDeckException - if the deck is empty and there are no cards to draw

    • getFirstCardKingdom

      public Kingdom getFirstCardKingdom()
      Gets the kingdom of the first card in the deck. This method returns the kingdom of the top card in the deck without removing it.
      Returns:
      the Kingdom of the first card in the deck

    • getCards

      public ArrayList<ResourceCard> getCards()
      Gets the list of resource cards in the deck.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of ResourceCard objects

    • deckSize

      public int deckSize()
      Gets the number of cards remaining in the deck.
      Returns:
      the size of the deck
